availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Green Forbis, Sr. (Green County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Green County, Kentucky, native. Son of Morgan Forbis and Margaret Forbis. Married to Rebecca Erwin Forbis in Green County, Kentucky, on April 20, 1823. Father of Amanda Forbis, William F. Forbis, Susan J. Forbis, Emaline Forbis, Green Forbis, Jr., Newberry G. Forbis, Catharine Forbis, and James Forbis. Resident of Green County, Kentucky, in 1840. Farmer in Green County in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 94A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 620.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Precinct 3, p. 470B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Deaths.
Kentucky, County Marriages, 1797-1954, Genealogical Society of Salt Lake City, Salt Lake City, UT, Green County Minister Returns, Film 007721470, p. 420.
